metadata.title: CVE-2018-12015 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Perl through 5.26.2, the Archive::Tar module allows remote attackers tobypass a directory-traversal protection mechanism, and overwrite arbitraryfiles, via an archive file containing a symlink and a regular file with thesame name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12015` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libperl5.26 - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.1
perl - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.1
perl-base - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.1
perl-debug - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.1
perl-modules-5.26 - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: perl package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.26.1-6ubuntu0.1').
